pages.title: Cryst. Redstone
pages.text: $(crystalised_redstone_dust) are introduced by $(sorcerycraft) and are used to recharge drained $(crystalised_redstone_block) by right clicking them. $(br2)A $(crystalised_redstone_dust) can be crafted with $(bold)1x Redstone Dusts$() and $(bold)1x$() $(crystals). $(br)See the recipe on the opposite page.
